mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, T.TITLE, T.DESCRIPTION, T.COMPLETED, T.CREATED_AT, T.PROJECT_ID, T.START_DATE, T.DUE_DATE, T.ASSIGNEE_ID, U.NAME AS ASSIGNEE_NAME FROM TODO T LEFT JOIN APP_USER U ON T.ASSIGNEE_ID = U.ID ORDER BY T.CREATED_AT ASC

SELECT T.ID, T.TITLE, T.DESCRIPTION, T.COMPLETED, T.CREATED_AT, T.PROJECT_ID, T.START_DATE, T.DUE_DATE, T.ASSIGNEE_ID, U.NAME AS ASSIGNEE_NAME FROM TODO T LEFT JOIN APP_USER U ON T.ASSIGNEE_ID = U.ID WHERE T.ID = #{id}

SELECT T.ID, T.TITLE, T.DESCRIPTION, T.COMPLETED, T.CREATED_AT, T.PROJECT_ID, T.START_DATE, T.DUE_DATE, T.ASSIGNEE_ID, U.NAME AS ASSIGNEE_NAME FROM TODO T LEFT JOIN APP_USER U ON T.ASSIGNEE_ID = U.ID WHERE T.COMPLETED = #{completed} ORDER BY T.CREATED_AT ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TODO ( TITLE, DESCRIPTION, COMPLETED, CREATED_AT, PROJECT_ID, START_DATE, DUE_DATE, ASSIGNEE_ID ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{completed}, #{createdAt}, #{projectId}, #{startDate}, #{dueDate}, #{assigneeId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TODO SET TITLE = #{title}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, COMPLETED = #{completed}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}, START_DATE = #{startDate}, DUE_DATE = #{dueDate}, ASSIGNEE_ID = #{assigneeId} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, T.TITLE, T.DESCRIPTION, T.COMPLETED, T.CREATED_AT, T.PROJECT_ID, T.START_DATE, T.DUE_DATE, T.ASSIGNEE_ID, U.NAME AS ASSIGNEE_NAME FROM TODO T LEFT JOIN APP_USER U ON T.ASSIGNEE_ID = U.ID WHERE T.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} ORDER BY T.CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT T.ID, T.TITLE, T.DESCRIPTION, T.COMPLETED, T.CREATED_AT, T.PROJECT_ID, T.START_DATE, T.DUE_DATE, T.ASSIGNEE_ID, U.NAME AS ASSIGNEE_NAME FROM TODO T LEFT JOIN APP_USER U ON T.ASSIGNEE_ID = U.ID WHERE T.PROJECT_ID IS NULL ORDER BY T.CREATED_AT DESC
